name: Creator Wizard Seth's Multiplayer Strategy FPS
name_original: Creator Wizard Seth's Multiplayer Strategy FPS
description: Strategical Teamwork based first person shooting game. Engage in static repeatable asymmetric or symmetric scenarios where you can learn how to manage your energy, your supplies, make formations with your team mates, and learn how to also attack and defend strategical locations. Learn with your friends inner growth and cooperation to lift yourself to higher dimensions and experience who you really are on a deeper level.
